bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
Aug 15 22:16:47 rawhide gnome-terminal-server[1895]: (gnome-terminal-server:1895): Gtk-WARNING **: GtkBox 0x55efe8e3e140 is drawn without a current allocation. This should not happen. Aug 15 22:16:47 rawhide gnome-terminal-server[1895]: (gnome-terminal-server:1895): Gtk-WARNING **: TerminalNotebook 0x55efe8e42280 is drawn without a current allocation. This should not happen. Aug 15 22:16:47 rawhide gnome-terminal-server[1895]: (gnome-terminal-server:1895): Gtk-WARNING **: TerminalTabLabel 0x55efe8c4e3e0 is drawn without a current allocation. This should not happen. Aug 15 22:16:47 rawhide gnome-terminal-server[1895]: (gnome-terminal-server:1895): Gtk-WARNING **: GtkLabel 0x55efe8c4e590 is drawn without a current allocation. This should not happen. Aug 15 22:16:53 rawhide gnome-terminal-server[1895]: (gnome-terminal-server:1895): Gtk-WARNING **: TerminalWindow 0x55efe8e34400 is drawn without a current allocation. This should not happen. Aug 15 22:16:53 rawhide gnome-terminal-server[1895]: (gnome-terminal-server:1895): Gtk-WARNING **: GtkBox 0x55efe8e3e140 is drawn without a current allocation. This should not happen. Aug 15 22:16:53 rawhide gnome-terminal-server[1895]: (gnome-terminal-server:1895): Gtk-WARNING **: TerminalNotebook 0x55efe8e42280 is drawn without a current allocation. This should not happen. Aug 15 22:16:53 rawhide gnome-terminal-server[1895]: (gnome-terminal-server:1895): Gtk-WARNING **: GtkScrollbar 0x55efe9064380 is drawn without a current allocation. This should not happen. Aug 15 22:16:53 rawhide gnome-terminal-server[1895]: (gnome-terminal-server:1895): Gtk-WARNING **: TerminalTabLabel 0x55efe8c4e3e0 is drawn without a current allocation. This should not happen. Aug 15 22:16:53 rawhide gnome-terminal-server[1895]: (gnome-terminal-server:1895): Gtk-WARNING **: GtkLabel 0x55efe8c4e590 is drawn without a current allocation. This should not happen. Aug 15 22:17:10 rawhide gnome-terminal-server[1895]: (gnome-terminal-server:1895): Gtk-WARNING **: GtkScrollbar 0x55efe9064380 is drawn without a current allocation. This should not happen.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): gnome-terminal-3.20.2-2.fc25.x86_64 gtk3-3.21.4-2.fc25.x86_64
How reproducible: Good
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Open gnome-terminal 2. Watch output of journalctl -f while using gnome-terminal e.g. resizing window
Actual results: System log filled with GTK warnings
Expected results:
Additional info:
